opt_queries.item: CREATE TABLE `cscart_what_other_customers_are_looking_at` (`input_id` MEDIUMINT( 8 ) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`user_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`input_id`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
ALTER TABLE `cscart_products` ADD `view_count` MEDIUMINT( 8 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0';

CREATE TABLE `cscart_best_seller_in_a_category` (`input_id` MEDIUMINT( 8 ) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`category_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`sales_count` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (input_id)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `cscart_frequently_bought_with` (`input_id` MEDIUMINT( 8 ) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`bought_with_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`bought_with_count` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (input_id)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
